storyInfo: Team Rainbow works with Tecno to fix the malfunctioning festival puppets. The dancing puppets' first rehearsal blows minds.

attributes.content: Tecno seems ready with the equipment she's wearing, but her constant ear-scratching tells me otherwise.
attributes.name: Fuze

attributes.content: Should we act now?
attributes.name: Fuze

attributes.content: Hold on, we'll wait for her to land first. I don't want to crash into her when I go down.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Hey, hey, hey! Slow down, you're dropping me too fast!
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: She thinks that's fast?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: She's like a tiny feather falling slowly in the air.
attributes.name: Fuze

attributes.content: This isn't the best time to be laughing yourself silly.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: She's in position.
attributes.name: Fuze

attributes.content: Everything's in place, you can go.
attributes.name: Fuze

attributes.content: Ela grabs the safety rope with both hands, twists her body out of the window, and stands on the outer wall trying to balance her suspended body against the wind.
She waits until the wind gradually dies down, and frees a hand to straighten her cap that had slanted in the wind as she flashes a smile to Fuze.
Soon after, she lets go of the rope with her remaining hand and disappears out the window, leaving only a rope sliding quickly from the windowsill.
Phew... alright, seems like they managed to connect.
attributes.name: Fuze

attributes.content: Waahhh—! Why are you here too?!
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Quiet, and pay attention. You almost cut a major cable.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: What happened to those people following you?
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Shook them off.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Didn't Papá tell you not to get involved...?
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Yeah, he did.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Then why did you come?
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: To make sure you don't mess up this project.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Why you...! Are you talking to me like that just because you know what to do?
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Well, do you?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Er...
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: I did a quick scan of the puppet's arm controls on the way down here, the hydraulic driver is the one causing the problem. Hand me your tools.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: They're right above, hurry!
We would have caught them a long time ago if that woman didn't get in our way.
Heh...
attributes.name: Fuze

attributes.content: Time to deal with my troubles.
attributes.name: Fuze

attributes.content: Boss! Good news, the cables are free!
attributes.name: Operating Crew

attributes.content: So soon? Alright, get Tecno back up and we'll get back to assembling the puppets' limbs.
attributes.name: Operating Crew Director

attributes.content: She says she wants to stay in there.
attributes.name: Operating Crew

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Operating Crew Director

attributes.content: I said, I want to stay here! I'll help out with the installation from here!
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Ah, I'm glad that you want to help us out, but can you promise you won't bother Miss Ela over here?
attributes.name: Operating Crew Director

attributes.content: Say that again and I'll fly right up and smash your face in!
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: *ahem* Miss Ela, do you mind if she stays here, for my face's sake?
attributes.name: Operating Crew Director

attributes.content: Of course, Tecno is a loyal friend. She doesn't want me to risk my life all alone at such a height. How can I feel anything other than gratitude?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: *cough* *cough*!
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Hey, look! The puppet's arm is moving again!
attributes.name: Astonished Resident

attributes.content: That's Tecno over there... but why's someone else with her?
attributes.name: Astonished Resident

attributes.content: Who is that? An engineer? A technician? Tecno's assistant?
attributes.name: Confused Resident

attributes.content: An assistant? For real? Tecno never liked other people getting involved in her designs.
attributes.name: Astonished Resident

attributes.content: Let me take a look again... Nope, something's blocking my view. Hey, you over there! Can you tell who it is?
attributes.name: Confused Resident

attributes.content: You talking to me?
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Yeah, you've been looking that way for a good while now. Can you make out who's with Tecno?
attributes.name: Confused Resident

attributes.content: You mean Ela? That's a little complicated—
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Woah, am I seeing things or did that one just hit Tecno on the head...? The last guy who did something like that almost got a finger bitten off.
attributes.name: Astonished Resident

attributes.content: Uh, I guess you could say she's... a friend of Tecno's?
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Damn, you slipped away so fast.
attributes.name: Community Guard

attributes.content: Mmph...
attributes.name: Fuze

attributes.content: Huh. A tough one, staying silent after tasting one of my punches.
attributes.name: Community Guard

attributes.content: Get out of the way, unless you plan on dying here!
attributes.name: Community Guard

attributes.content: Ahhh—!!
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Hold on, Tecno! We'll be right there, that woman won't touch another hair on your head!
attributes.name: Community Guard

attributes.content: Get your hands off me! What are you up to?!
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Get away from the window!
attributes.name: Community Guard

attributes.content: Tecno! Are you alright?!
attributes.name: Community Guard

attributes.content: Wh-Why are you up there?
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Papá sent me to watch these foreigners and I heard you screaming, what did that woman do to you?! I'll be down to help right away!
attributes.name: Community Guard

attributes.content: Uh, no, it's nothing, I'm fine... I just... just...
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: I only bopped her on the head.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Did it hurt?
attributes.name: Community Guard

attributes.content: No...
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Then why did you scream?
attributes.name: Community Guard

attributes.content: I... uh, anyway, I'm totally fine, you guys go back and tell Papá everything's okay. I'll watch her and nothing will go wrong.
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Tecno. Pass me the soldering tools, thanks.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Here you go.
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: (Whispering) She's... willing to play assistant...?
attributes.name: Community Guard

attributes.content: See, they're working so well together. Everything's okay, right?
attributes.name: Fuze

attributes.content: The puppets are all done, boss!
attributes.name: Operating Crew

attributes.content: Phew... is everyone ready? Amigos, this is the hardest part.
attributes.name: Operating Crew Director

attributes.content: We must give them a pulse. Give them blood, vitality, life.
attributes.name: Operating Crew Director

attributes.content: I've been ready for a while, boss. Give the order.
attributes.name: Operating Crew

attributes.content: Hello, everyone. After more than six months of hard work and dedication, we've overcome our obstacles and finally arrived at the end. Thank you all for sticking with it.
attributes.name: Operating Crew Director

attributes.content: Listen up, everybody. Our first rehearsal is about to begin.
attributes.name: Operating Crew Director

attributes.content: Come on, girls. Let's bat those eyelashes.
attributes.name: Operating Crew Director

attributes.content: They're alive.
attributes.name: Community Resident

attributes.content: I've pictured this many times.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: From the flyers, design drafts, and what everyone was saying... I figured I'd have to compromise on my design, that the pair could never be what I wanted them to be.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: What about now, looking at them with your own eyes?
attributes.name: Community Resident

attributes.content: All I can say is... it's beyond what I could've imagined myself.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Iana is once again struck by their beautiful faces and delicate construction as she looks at the two puppets blinking away.
They looked like beautiful art installations when they were standing still, but their movements have now transformed them into the two most beautiful girls in town.
Iana is unable to glimpse their eyes as their thick lashes lower too quickly for her to get a good look.
Suddenly, one of them lowers her head, turning toward Iana. Her lower eyelashes lift without dropping back down, and their gazes meet.
A pair of vermillion pupils.
Why are her eyes orange?
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: It's the morning sun reflecting in them. She'll dance under the sun as much as she likes.
attributes.name: Community Resident

attributes.content: Oh, so it's the sun making that color.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: You know, we originally wanted to have their eyes in black because it'd be easier. But Tecno disagreed, she thinks black is the worst color to pair with the sun.
attributes.name: Community Resident

attributes.content: No, she's got it wrong.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: The worst color to pair with the sun is actually white.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: The puppets begin to stretch their limbs as the crowd cheers on. Moving each joint takes a group of people and all their strength, shouting as they pull the rope in unison.
On pull! Uno, dos, tres, pull!
attributes.name: Operating Crew Director

attributes.content: Gargh—!
attributes.name: Operating Crew

attributes.content: The puppets lift their knees, and take a step forward.
Alright, everyone! Uno, dos, tres, release!
attributes.name: Operating Crew Director

attributes.content: Eargh——!
attributes.name: Operating Crew

attributes.content: The puppets wave their arms and brush them against their sides.
Okay, uno, dos, tres, again!
attributes.name: Operating Crew Director

attributes.content: Hyah———!
attributes.name: Operating Crew

attributes.content: They walk briskly through the residential buildings along a path made by the spectators, occasionally bending down to fit below the skyways.
They eventually stop in the neighborhood's central square.
One, two, three! Argh—!
attributes.name: Fuze

attributes.content: Thanks, friend.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Want to find a better spot to enjoy the show?
attributes.name: Fuze

attributes.content: I'm good, the view from this window isn't bad.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: What time is it...? Yes, almost here.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: As the sky gradually darkens and the twin moons rise from the far side of the city, the moonlit concrete floor appears to resemble a frozen lake in winter.
As the two puppet dancers twirl on the ground, the moonlight highlights their bodies as they move to the castanets' rhythm, alternating between straightening and twisting.
Music pours out from the skyscrapers, roofs, alleys, and even some dimly lit windows.
This is an impromptu ensemble performance, without a rehearsal or conductor.
The sounds flow freely along with the puppet dancers' choreography.
Their skirts catch the notes landing at their feet, transforming them into a part of their beautiful dance.
The tall puppets lower their heads, watching those at their feet.
Those people, small and light as a feather, follow in their dance steps.
They leap into the air and come back down to the ground.
Still think I wasn't talking sense?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: (Shakes head)
attributes.name: Fuze

attributes.content: It was well worth it.
attributes.name: Fuze

attributes.content: So you were willing to help them out because you envisioned something like this?
attributes.name: Fuze

attributes.content: No, I never thought of it that way. It wouldn't have been fun otherwise.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Woah, amazing. Who taught you the harmonica?
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: It was Mama, she can do anything, she can play this, she can dance, she can draw, she can even bake super yummy ker-sonts.
attributes.name: Small Child

attributes.content: Mama is my favorite person!
attributes.name: Small Child

attributes.content: I have the utmost respect for this superhuman woman, but I must insist—it should be pronounced 'Cwuh-son'!
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: ......Quaso?
attributes.name: Small Child

attributes.content: Hahahaha—!
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Ugh... forget it.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: I'm going to get some coffee.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: Señor Reynell, I've finished inspecting the box, and it'll take a few weeks to repair it.
attributes.name: Restorationist

attributes.content: But I've managed to reproduce a portion of the drum according to that hidden score. Would you like to hear it?
attributes.name: Restorationist

attributes.content: Yes...
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: A melody pours out of the box, bringing Reynell back more than a decade, to a time when he hid behind a door to eavesdrop on the tinkling coming from his mother's workshop.
Judging by this little bit I've restored, it must be a lullaby.
attributes.name: Restorationist

attributes.content: An extremely simple tune.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: Yes, I was surprised when I first heard it, because I recall that your mother crafted elaborate melodies into her older works.
attributes.name: Restorationist

attributes.content: She wrote this piece herself...
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: She's no professional composer, but she, as a mother, wrote this simple lullaby for her child.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: Nothing special about it.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: But it must be special to that child, at least.
attributes.name: Restorationist

attributes.content: Señor Reynell... you've been staring out the window this whole time, is something there?
attributes.name: Restorationist

attributes.content: Nothing much, just watching the moons rise.
attributes.name: Reynell
